commentBody:
TB12 has handled more distractions and terrible press (and misinformation fed from the NFL) for several months. We give him and the team credit for putting it out of their minds, deal with the injuries and get where they are. In Tom Brady's words, "I didn't come this far, to only come this far."

Footballs have not been the distraction this season, so enough with dredging up that dreck!

One game at a time - that is the Patriot Way.
